doc.field: nits'etdeek danh ts'ą̈' tidhihshyah de', ut'ah kitdagnthayh, ut'ah kitdagnthäł nts'ą̈' küh tagntth'äł.
nits'etdeek danh ts'ą̈' tidhihshyah de', ut'ah kitdagnthayh, ut'ah kitdagnthäł nts'ą̈' küh tagntth'äł.
If I go to the outhouse, I'll stumble over it; I will fall over it and will fall next to [the trail].
